Question.Subject: my lhasa apso hind legs are not working?
Question.Content: for the past few days she has been shivering and wont eat but she could walk now her hid legs are not working but she is back to her self .. what should i do .?

ChosenAnswer: just pray for her ad=nd try to hlep your dog and do some physical therapy on the hind legs and take her to the vet and ig it costs a whole lot ask hlep from you friends and family adn since shes not eating feed her by hand

Answers.Answer: obviously take her to the vet
